short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate security questionnaires response and make security reviews easier

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Skypher automates security questionnaires response in the sales process. Our customers have been reducing questionnaires response time by 75% through our solution.

Skypher intuitive software uses Artificial Intelligence to streamline the way organizations respond to security reviews. We help them to meet the ever-increasing demands of customer and regulatory-driven cybersecurity requirements. 

Additionally, with Skypher’s Google Chrome extension, you’ll be empowered with the your security content on any website. This is specially useful to fill out online security questionnaires.
